titles.title: SSN Act
A bill to enhance Social Security benefits for children, divorced spouses, and widows and widowers, and for other purposes.
SSN Act
Stronger Safety Net Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Stronger Safety Net Act or the SSN Act
This bill expands and otherwise revises benefits under the Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance benefits program. The bill also establishes an additional payroll surtax.
